title: Forum supports women living with epilepsy across all life stages
desc: Epilepsy Action Australia and Australian Women with Epilepsy are inviting women across the country to take part in a powerful one-day forum designed to uplift, inform and support women living with epilepsy. title: China's Xuelong wraps up ocean mission in 42nd Antarctic expedition

title: “I am not a Zionist”: Hugh Laurie responds after Dana Eden tribute sparks backlash
desc: UK News: Hugh Laurie faced backlash after paying tribute to late producer Dana Eden. He responded firmly to accusations of being a Zionist, emphasizing the importance of mourning over political disputes.

title: Smriti Mandhana, Jemimah Rodrigues power India to 176 in Adelaide T20I
desc: Smriti Mandhana and Jemimah Rodrigues helped India post 176/6 in the third and final match of the ongoing India vs Australia Women's T20I series at the Adelaide Oval on Saturday.
